titles.title: Praise The Lord, Praise His Holy Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, Praise His Holy Name.
Praise the Lord, Praise His Holy Name.
Praise the Lord, Praise His Holy Name.
O Praise, O Praise the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He took us out of bondage, Praise His Holy Name (3x)
O Praise, O Praise the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He filled us with His Spirit, etc.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alaba a Jehová, alaba su nombre santo. (3x)
Alaba, alaba a Jehová.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesús es mi salvador, alaba su nombre santo. (3x)
Alaba, alaba a Jehová.
